description:
We specialize in staffing for Purchasing and Logistics for the West Palm Beach to Deerfield Beach area and we are looking to fill Purchasing and Logistics positions for this area. The Purchasing and Logistics Manager will be responsible for overseeing all aspects of our procurement and logistics operations. This includes managing vendor relationships, negotiating contracts, ensuring timely delivery of goods, and optimizing our supply chain processes. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in purchasing and logistics, excellent negotiation skills, and a keen eye for detail. Apply today and email resumes to lauren.izzo@randstadusa.com

salary: $55,000 - $70,000 per year

shift: First

work hours: 8 AM - 5 PM

education: Bachelors

Responsibilities

  • Develop and implement procurement strategies to ensure cost-effective sourcing of materials and services.
  • Manage vendor relationships, including evaluating performance, negotiating contracts, and ensuring compliance with terms and conditions.
  • Coordinate logistics operations, including shipping, receiving, warehousing, and distribution.
  • Monitor inventory levels and implement inventory control procedures to minimize excess and obsolete stock.
  • Analyze supply chain data to identify and implement process improvements.
  • Collaborate with internal departments to forecast demand and ensure timely delivery of products.
  • Prepare and present reports on procurement and logistics activities to senior management.

Skills

  • Operations
  • Purchasing/Procurement
  • Logistics

Qualifications

  • Years of experience: 4 years
  • Experience level: Experienced
